name: elizaos-documentation-system
description: AI-powered documentation generation system for ElizaOS

scripts.clean: rm -rf output/scraped-content/* && rm -f deepwiki_eliza_links.txt elizaos_categorization.md elizaos_summary.md EXECUTION_SUMMARY.md
scripts.setup: bun install && bunx playwright install chromium
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: start, run, crawl, categorize, scrape, generate, estimate, polish, clean, setup'

author: ElizaOS Documentation Team
